column4: hi, is there a reasonable way to get a list of all packages I've chosen to install (so, excluding dependencies). Plan to wipe and install 10.04, and this would make life much easier!
yes, you can. Type 'man dpkg' and read the last part under examples. It tells you how to do it...
google says /home/netlogon is samba-related. Dunno about /home/pdf-documents...
